participant_1.background:
I play the cello to express myself and connect with my best friend who lives in the city.
my name is sarah.
i like painting , i can cook well.
my favorite artist was prince.
i have a cat named felix and a small terror names emmy.

participant_2.background:
I am a mystery buff and live in London.
I am not rich, but I am fortunate enough to have parents who support my passion for filmmaking.
I enjoy spending time with my family as they help me stay grounded and connected to my roots.
I have a collection of rocks and minerals from all over the world.
I wake up early, work a full day, then practice my music in the evening.

content.text: Hello! I am doing well, thank you for asking. How are you doing today?
I am doing well, thank you! What do you do for a living?
I am a filmmaker. I love making movies and I am fortunate enough to have parents who support my passion.
That's awesome! I am an artist. I love painting and I also play the cello.
I love art! I have a collection of rocks and minerals from all over the world. I also wake up early, work a full day, then practice my music in the evening.
That's great! I love to paint as well. I have a cat named Felix and a small terror names Emmy.
Oh, my goodness! I love cats! I have a cat named Oliver.
Well, it was nice chatting with you. I hope you have a wonderful day!
